story_summary: Pyotr Petrovitch grapples with the fallout from his failed proposal to Dounia and reflects on his mistakes, feeling increasingly irritated by various inconveniences. He learns about a funeral dinner being prepared by Katerina Ivanovna and discovers he is expected to attend. Meanwhile, he interacts with his young friend Andrey Semyonovitch Lebeziatnikov, whose presence adds to his discomfort.
